markdown:
<title level="1" right="Action">[Expeditious Inspection](/Actions.aspx?ID=548) <actions string="Free Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=318" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 57 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency** once per 10 minutes

</column>

---

You observe and assess your surroundings with great speed. You [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26), [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84), or [Sense Motive](/Actions.aspx?ID=85).
name: Expeditious Inspection
